briefTitle: Detection of Flap Ischemia Using Interstitial Glucose Monitor
officialTitle: Postoperative Monitoring of Tissue Perfusion in Microvascular Free Flaps Using Continuous Interstitial Glucose Monitoring Device: A Pilot Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Temporal correlation between interstitial glucose measurements and flap ischemia
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients who are undergoing unilateral or bilateral breast reconstruction with free flap including DIEP flaps at Hamilton Health Sciences, starting from the date of ethics approval.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with diabetes (on oral antiglycemic medications or insulin-dependent)
* Patients who are on immunosuppressive medication
* Patients undergoing breast reconstruction involving expanders or implants
* Patients with active infections
